price: Dan Dia-lah Allah yang telah menghidupkan kamu, kemudian mematikan kamu, kemudian menghidupkan kamu (lagi); sesungguhnya manusia itu benar-benar sangat mengingkari nikmat.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
translations: He will cause you to die
